amendatorysection.para: After the charge of the court, the grand jury shall retire with the officer appointed to attend to them, and shall proceed to inquire of and present all offenses whatever committed within the limits of the county in and for which they were impaneled and sworn or affirmed.

annotation.para: "All offenses" embrace misdemeanors. Nelson v. State, 115 Neb. 26, 211 N.W. 175 (1926).
